contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 22, 1997 D SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (Second Section)
SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (Second Section) 20 Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest sewbba-treorchy-contest-second-section
Entertainments Contest
Parc & Dare Theatre, Treorchy, Rhondda Cynon Taf, Wales, UK Best instrumentalist - euphonium - Newport. Prizes - 1st £150, 2nd £90, 3rd £60. 7 bands competed
April 7, 2015, noon July 2, 2020, 2:36 p.m.
1 Treherbert & District Band Graham Sheppard
2 Pontypool Brass Robert Burnett
3 RAF St. Athan Voluntary Band Alan Bourne
4 Markham and District Band H. Jones
5 Newport Borough Band Colin Hogg
6 Ebbw Vale Band William Cross
7 Gwaun-cae-Gurwen Band J. Wynne Williams
Withdrawn Blaina & District Bernard Williams
